text: Indeed those who persecute believing men and believing women by having them burnt then do not repent there will be for them the chastisement of Hell in return for their disbelief and there will also be for them the chastisement of burning that is to say the chastisement for their having had the believers burnt in the Hereafter; but it is also said that there is this chastisement for them in this world as when the fire rose up and burnt them as mentioned above.
